connect20/tgm_voodoo_ext.name: connect20/TGM_Voodoo_Ext

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/tgm_voodoo_ext.description: Our extension will integrate SMS features into your Magento store for free. When an order is placed, shipped or status changed you can confirm with your customer and/or store admin via a text message sent directly to their mobile phone.
